content.raw: Thanks for the testing Steve. I would not like to get this part of support for gazebo compilation if it ends up in segfaults at runtime. We probably need to add a check for less than 1.9 versions (in this same pull request) of ogre until we address the issues.
content.html: Thanks for the testing Steve. I would not like to get this part of support for gazebo compilation if it ends up in segfaults at runtime. We probably need to add a check for less than 1.9 versions (in this same pull request) of ogre until we address the issues.
